summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Question Bank system. Backend achieved 100% success rate (11/11 tests). Frontend fully functional with successful question creation, form validation, table management, and navigation. All requested features working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: User authentication and registration
Backend: Question creation endpoint (/api/questions POST)
Backend: Question listing endpoint (/api/questions GET)
Backend: Question retrieval endpoint (/api/questions/{id} GET)
Backend: Question update endpoint (/api/questions/{id} PUT)
Backend: Question delete endpoint (/api/questions/{id} DELETE)
Backend: Question validation (invalid period, chart type, date format)
Backend: Missing required fields validation
Backend: Dashboard stats with question count
Frontend: Question Bank button in dashboard header
Frontend: Navigation from dashboard to Question Bank management
Frontend: Question Bank management page loading
Frontend: Add Question button and modal opening
Frontend: Question form with all required fields (Category, Question Text, Importance/Reason, Expected Action, Period, Deadline, Chart Type)
Frontend: Form field validation and input handling
Frontend: Period dropdown with correct options (Haftalık, Aylık, Çeyreklik, Altı Aylık, Yıllık, İhtiyaç Halinde)
Frontend: Chart type dropdown with correct options (Sütun, Pasta, Çizgi, Alan, Bar, Trend)
Frontend: Date input validation for deadlines
Frontend: Question form submission and creation
Frontend: Question table display with new questions
Frontend: Question table management (edit/delete buttons present)
Frontend: Navigation back to dashboard from Question Bank
Frontend: Dashboard stats showing question count updates
Frontend: Complete question creation workflow
Frontend: Form modal closing after successful submission

items: Question Bank system is fully functional and ready for production use
All requested features have been implemented and tested successfully
No critical issues found - system working as expected
